sn46.57:1.2: “Atthikasanna, bhikkhave, bhavita bahulikata mahapphala hoti mahanisamsa.
sn46.57:1.3: Katham bhavita ca, bhikkhave, atthikasanna katham bahulikata mahapphala hoti mahanisamsa?
sn46.57:1.4: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu atthikasannasahagatam satisambojjhangam bhaveti vivekanissitam viraganissitam nirodhanissitam vossaggaparinamim …pe…
sn46.57:1.5: atthikasannasahagatam upekkhasambojjhangam bhaveti vivekanissitam viraganissitam nirodhanissitam vossaggaparinamim.
sn46.57:1.6: Evam bhavita kho, bhikkhave, atthikasanna evam bahulikata mahapphala hoti mahanisamsa”ti.
sn46.57:2.1: “Atthikasannaya, bhikkhave, bhavitaya bahulikataya dvinnam phalanam annataram phalam patikankham—dittheva dhamme anna, sati va upadisese anagamita.
sn46.57:2.2: Katham bhavitaya ca kho, bhikkhave, atthikasannaya katham bahulikataya dvinnam phalanam annataram phalam patikankham—dittheva dhamme anna, sati va upadisese anagamita?
sn46.57:2.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu atthikasannasahagatam satisambojjhangam bhaveti …pe…
sn46.57:2.4: atthikasannasahagatam upekkhasambojjhangam bhaveti vivekanissitam viraganissitam nirodhanissitam vossaggaparinamim.
sn46.57:2.5: Evam bhavitaya kho, bhikkhave, atthikasannaya evam bahulikataya dvinnam phalanam annataram phalam patikankham—dittheva dhamme anna, sati va upadisese anagamita”ti.
sn46.57:3.1: “Atthikasanna, bhikkhave, bhavita bahulikata mahato atthaya samvattati.
sn46.57:3.2: Katham bhavita ca, bhikkhave, atthikasanna katham bahulikata mahato atthaya samvattati?
sn46.57:3.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu atthikasannasahagatam satisambojjhangam bhaveti …pe…
sn46.57:3.4: atthikasannasahagatam upekkhasambojjhangam bhaveti vivekanissitam viraganissitam nirodhanissitam vossaggaparinamim.
sn46.57:3.5: Evam bhavita kho, bhikkhave, atthikasanna evam bahulikata mahato atthaya samvattati”ti.
sn46.57:4.1: “Atthikasanna, bhikkhave, bhavita bahulikata mahato yogakkhemaya samvattati.
sn46.57:4.2: Katham bhavita ca, bhikkhave, atthikasanna katham bahulikata mahato yogakkhemaya samvattati?
sn46.57:4.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu atthikasannasahagatam satisambojjhangam bhaveti …pe…
sn46.57:4.4: atthikasannasahagatam upekkhasambojjhangam bhaveti vivekanissitam viraganissitam nirodhanissitam vossaggaparinamim.
sn46.57:4.5: Evam bhavita kho, bhikkhave, atthikasanna evam bahulikata mahato yogakkhemaya samvattati”ti.
sn46.57:5.1: “Atthikasanna, bhikkhave, bhavita bahulikata mahato samvegaya samvattati.
sn46.57:5.2: Katham bhavita ca, bhikkhave, atthikasanna katham bahulikata mahato samvegaya samvattati?
sn46.57:5.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu atthikasannasahagatam satisambojjhangam bhaveti …pe…
sn46.57:5.4: atthikasannasahagatam upekkhasambojjhangam bhaveti vivekanissitam viraganissitam nirodhanissitam vossaggaparinamim.
sn46.57:5.5: Evam bhavita kho, bhikkhave, atthikasanna evam bahulikata mahato samvegaya samvattati”ti.
sn46.57:6.1: “Atthikasanna, bhikkhave, bhavita bahulikata mahato phasuviharaya samvattati.
sn46.57:6.2: Katham bhavita ca, bhikkhave, atthikasanna katham bahulikata mahato phasuviharaya samvattati?
sn46.57:6.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu atthikasannasahagatam satisambojjhangam bhaveti …pe…
sn46.57:6.4: atthikasannasahagatam upekkhasambojjhangam bhaveti vivekanissitam viraganissitam nirodhanissitam vossaggaparinamim.
sn46.57:6.5: Evam bhavita kho, bhikkhave, atthikasanna evam bahulikata mahato phasuviharaya samvattati”ti
